import React from 'react'; import { Target, Info } from 'lucide-react'; const HeatmapLegend: React.FC = () => { return (

Suitability Heatmap

Excellent Moderate Poor

• Green: High suitability (80-100%)

• Yellow: Medium suitability (40-79%)

• Red: Low suitability (0-39%)

Based on renewable resources, infrastructure proximity, and policy factors

); }; export default HeatmapLegend;
